definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]

sentences.english: Please send in comprehensive resume and recent photograph to us.
sentences.chinese: 清将简历和近照寄到本公司。

sentences.english: I had never written a resume before.
One of the best resumes we've seen, made on a T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们见过的最具创意的简历之一，体恤衫。

sentences.english: Interested parties, please send your detailed resume with the latestexpected salary to by email to us within two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 有意者请将个人简历于二周内邮件至本公司。

sentences.english: Present a professional resume and be ready to explain everything in detail.
sentences.chinese: 递上一份专业的简历，并准备好详细解释每件事。

sentences.english: All applications will be placed in our Talent Pool and handled with strictest confidence, non-returnable.
sentences.chinese: 所有简历均会存入集团人才库，保密处理，恕不退还。

sentences.english: Enclosed is my resume, and hoping for your immediate reply.
sentences.chinese: 简历随信附上，希望早获回音。

sentences.english: Talk with venture capital investors and give them your resume.
sentences.chinese: 找风投谈你的想法，给他们看你的简历。

sentences.english: Please mail us your resume first.
sentences.chinese: 请先将你的简历寄过来。

sentences.english: Another year recruiting season, the campus, curriculum vitae in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 又是一年招聘季，校园里，简历在风中飘荡。

sentences.english: In Chapter XIX, I talk about what you must have in your Curriculum Vitae.
sentences.chinese: 第十九章中，我谈论你必须在你的简历。

sentences.english: But they can see my resume. It~s all in there.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们可以看我的羭简历，都在那里呢。

sentences.english: Keep your online resume hosted for free on these cool websites.
sentences.chinese: 将你的在线简历托管到这些酷站上吧。

sentences.english: DO you require an english resume?
sentences.chinese: 你们要求提供英文简历吗？

sentences.english: Use of the current "tense" in all jobs on the resume。
sentences.chinese: 在简历中的所有工作描述都使用现在时。

sentences.english: For any interest candidates please send your resume both in EnglishChinese to the email address.
sentences.chinese: 对所述职位感兴趣者，请发送中英文简历到本公司。

definition: to accept a job offer/to apply for an advertised position
to invite applications for a job/to recruit
student graduating in the current year/recent graduate
